name: Man Builder
description:
Chelyabinsk was occupied by a brutal gladiator, a well-worn man left the bar and remembered that he was a builder. Your task is to restore the destroyed buildings. PRESS E TO REPAIR!

Jam Site: 
South Ural State University

Jam Year: 
2020

Platforms: 
MS Windows

Tools And Technologies: 
Godot Engine

Technology Notes: 
Blender, Photoshop, Deep Art Effects, Ableton Live Suite 10

Credits:

Photo Processing: RuGrof

Music: aptk
